actions.committee: Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law

official_title: Urging the Secretary of State to designate the Caucasus Emirate as a foreign terrorist organization.

summary.text: Condemns the terrorist acts carried out by the Caucasus Emirate against Russian civilians. Urges the Secretary of State to designate the Caucasus Emirate as a foreign terrorist organization.

titles.title: Urging the Secretary of State to designate the Caucasus Emirate as a foreign terrorist organization.
